channel.title: [pi]a "more" option is posses teleport
channel.description: HI, im using hybrid pvp, and i just added nomad. now how would i make it so that when you clikc it, it gives you 4 boss teles, then a option, more for more boss teles. and how would you move one of teh 5 teles to the more option?

item.title: [pi]a "more" option is posses teleport
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

basicly its a dialogue which is a pain to handle in PI.

it will have option 1,2,3 & 4 and each one will have its own code to execute when you click it.
to create a new dialogue you will have the 4th option open up a new dialogue with new options.

if you need help add jake__2008@hotmail.co.uk i can maybe help you with the code via teamviewer

Read full topic
